summary: This is an email from a Senior Human Resource Specialist at the Federal Bureau of Prisons requesting the total number of authorized budgeted positions for MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center New York) per a DOJ request. The document appears to be routine administrative correspondence related to prison staffing.

persons.name: Senior Human Resource Specialist
persons.role: Senior Human Resource Specialist at Federal Bureau of Prisons
persons.context: Author of the email requesting information about authorized budgeted positions for MCC New York on behalf of the DOJ.

events.title: DOJ Request for MCC New York Staffing Information
events.description: A Senior Human Resource Specialist at the Federal Bureau of Prisons sends an email requesting the total number of authorized budgeted positions for MCC New York per a DOJ request.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center New York)
keyFacts: The DOJ requested information about authorized budgeted positions for MCC New York in August 2019.
The request was made by a Senior Human Resource Specialist at the Federal Bureau of Prisons.
The email indicates routine administrative communication regarding prison staffing.
The document shows bureaucratic processes within the Bureau of Prisons following a DOJ request.
The timing (August 2019) coincides with Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration at MCC New York before his death.
